properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 11:16PM EST until January 20 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations
of 1 to 4 inches.

* WHERE...Medina and Summit counties.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall is expected in the
far northern parts of Medina and Summit counties.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST MONDAY
